metadata.title: CVE-2014-9556 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the qtmd_decompress function in libmspack 0.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (hang) via a crafted CAB file, which triggers an infinite loop. It was discovered that cabextract incorrectly handled certain malformed CAB files. An attacker could use this issue to cause cabextract to hang, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: cabextract package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6-1.1').
libmspack package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4-3').
